prospect_description: Three‑location daycare in metro‑Atlanta (45 employees). Struggles with PTO tracking and changing GA/FL payroll tax rules.

decision_makers.persona_background: Former elementary teacher turned entrepreneur. Handles HR herself, hates paperwork. Wants mobile access.
Manages daily staffing and parent billing; eager for cleaner time‑clock exports to QuickBooks.

prospect_description: Craft‑brewery & tap‑room (70 staff, tipped + hourly). Needs tip‑credit compliance and weekly payroll.

decision_makers.persona_background: Runs operations; frustrated by overtime mis‑calculations on current provider.
Schedules 40+ servers and bartenders; wants smartphone time‑punch corrections.

prospect_description: Multi‑state home‑health agency (220 caregivers) with complex shift differentials and credential tracking.

decision_makers.persona_background: Nurse practitioner turned C‑suite. Needs tight compliance audits; open to HCM integration.
Processes 10,000+ visits per month; drowning in garnishments and mileage stipends.

prospect_description: Regional GC with 125 union & non‑union workers; certified payroll reports for DOT projects.

decision_makers.persona_background: CPA; wants job‑costing exports to Sage 300. Skeptical of cloud vendors’ support.
Oversees OSHA training, union dues, and onboarding. Needs bilingual onboarding forms.

prospect_description: Five vet clinics sharing one EIN (60 employees). Needs integrated time clocks and onboarding.

decision_makers.persona_background: Juggles scheduling in Excel; wants hands‑off tax filing.
Committed to growth; wants cost control and better PTO visibility for vets.

prospect_description: Seed‑stage SaaS (30 FTE, rapid hiring). Equity comp + remote workers in seven states.

decision_makers.persona_background: Startup veteran; values API access and HRIS integrations.
Owns payroll tax filings; wants automatic multi‑state withholding setup.

prospect_description: Boutique CPA firm (55 staff) that also runs client write‑up payrolls. Evaluating white‑label partnerships.

decision_makers.persona_background: Drives tech‑forward initiatives; cautiously optimistic about outsourcing backend engines.
Manages 120 client payrolls monthly; needs scalable API to feed QuickBooks Online.

prospect_description: Worker‑owned co‑op (150 employees, high turnover). Needs multilingual self‑service portals.

decision_makers.persona_background: Speaks Spanish & English; spends weekends correcting timesheets.
Handles wage grant reporting and ACA compliance; wants audit‑ready reports.

prospect_description: Omni‑channel outdoor gear retailer (85 warehouse + 40 HQ). Wants single‑sign‑on & ACA measurement.

decision_makers.persona_background: Ex‑Amazon ops lead; lives by KPIs and implementation timelines.

decision_makers.persona_background: Mission‑driven; limited budget but values service.
